text: Jinhen Allah Taalaa ney apney fazal say kuch dey rakha hai woh iss mein apni kanjoosi ko apney liye behtar khayal na keren bulkay woh inn kay liye nihayat bad tar hai un-qarib qayamat walay din yeh apni kanjoosi ki cheez kay toq daalay jayen gay aasmanon aur zamin ki meeras Allah Taalaa hi kay liye aur jo kuch tum ker rahey ho uss say Allah Taalaa aagah hai
